value.title: Share data simply and securely using Azure Data Share | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure Data Share is available in public preview today, and offers a simple pane of glass over your data sharing relationships. In this episode, you will learn how to easily provision a new data share, add datasets to it, specify your terms of use and invite recipients. Joanna walks through how you can

value.title: What are work or school, and Microsoft personal accounts? | One Dev Question: Jean-Marc Prieur
value.excerpt: In the One Dev Question series, Jean-Marc Prieur, a Principal Program Manager Program Manager working on the Microsoft identity platform, explains the difference between work and school accounts, and personal Microsoft accounts.   Get more information at: https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/active-directory/develop/

value.title: What is Azure Sentinel and why you should care | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn what Azure Sentinel is and how to use it. Azure Sentinel provides a threat detection and mitigation service that helps you to detect incident and threats when they happen and helps you to solve them as effectively as possible.    For more tips and
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dRpOR2GpL1s" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Cloud storage
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Gain a deep understanding of data and how it's stored on the cloud.

topItems.title: Cloud storage overview
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn all about data and get an overview of how it's stored, including local and distributed file systems, databases, and object storage.

topItems.title: Case studies: Distributed file systems
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Discover how distributed file systems work, then learn about Hadoop and Ceph.

topItems.title: Case studies: NoSQL databases and cloud object storage
topItems.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn about two more types of storage - NoSQL databases and object storage - with case studies from industry.

value.title: Manage hybrid infrastructure with Azure Arc
value.excerpt: Learn how to work with Azure Arc enabled servers and describe Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled servers
topItems.excerpt: This module introduces you to Azure Arc enabled servers and describes its characteristics, capabilities, and use cases.

topItems.title: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes
topItems.excerpt: Introduction to Azure Arc enabled Kubernetes

value.title: Application scalability on AKS with HorizontalPodAutoscalers
value.excerpt: Explore how to scale your deployed applications with HorizontalPodAutoscalers in AKS.

value.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks
value.excerpt: Create an Azure Notebook and use three popular Python libraries to analyze climate data collected by NASA, then share it.

images.title: Analyze climate data with Azure Notebooks

value.title: Secure your apps by using the sidecar configuration in Azure Container Instances
value.excerpt: Roll out Azure Container Instances into an Azure Virtual Network. You will evolve a basic container group into a more sophisticated configuration leveraging sidecar and initialization containers, as well as use private link to access other Azure PaaS resources.

value.title: Azure Spring Cloud workshop
value.excerpt: In this workshop, you'll go through tasks to deploy Spring Boot microservices to Azure Spring Cloud (ASC).

value.title: Build multi-table statements using KQL
value.excerpt: Build multi-table statements using KQL

value.title: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure
value.excerpt: Build systems of insights for enterprise scale with Power BI and Azure

value.title: Deploy a Java web app to Azure
value.excerpt: You'll learn how to create a Java web application and deploy it to Azure App Service.

value.title: Case studies: Distributed file systems
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Discover how distributed file systems work, then learn about Hadoop and Ceph.

value.title: CAF Plan: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data-driven plan.
value.excerpt: Prepare for cloud adoption with a data driven, cloud adoption plan from CAF. For new innovations, learn from others who have used the target platforms. For migrations, understand how to evaluate your assets and plan the efforts required to move them to the cloud.

value.title: Cloud storage overview
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn all about data and get an overview of how it's stored, including local and distributed file systems, databases, and object storage.

value.title: Cloud management
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Get into the nitty-gritty of cloud computing to understand how resources are provisioned, billed, and monitored. Learn about how to orchestrate cloud infrastructure with examples.

value.title: Datacenter components
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Take a deep dive into datacenters to discover how they are laid out and how computing resources are provisioned and metered.

value.title: Virtualize computing power
value.excerpt: Carnegie Mellon University's Cloud Developer course. Learn about how computing power is virtualized using virtual CPUs. Covers different types of CPU virtualization.

value.title: Collaborate with Git
value.excerpt: Use Git to track changes to source code and collaborate with other developers

value.excerpt: Connect Microsoft 365 Defender to Azure Sentinel

value.excerpt: Connect Power Platform to SAP on Azure

value.title: Copy and move blobs from one container or storage account to another from the command line and in code
value.excerpt: Learn how to utilize .NET Storage Client library, AzCopy, and Azure CLI utilities to copy and move blobs between contains and storage accounts both synchronously and asynchronously.

value.title: Deploy ASP.NET web apps with Azure Pipelines
value.excerpt: Azure Pipelines help automate building, deploying, and maintaining your applications. While they support a wide range of platforms and programming languages, in this module youâ€™ll focus on using them to implement ASP.NET apps on Azure App Service Web Apps with Azure SQL Database as their data store.

value.title: Build a real-time event-driven Java solution on Azure
value.excerpt: Send event based telemetric data in real time to Cosmos DB using Azure Functions and Event Hub.

value.title: Deploy a Java EE (Jakarta EE) application to Azure
value.excerpt: Deploy a Java EE (Jakarta EE) application to JBoss EAP on Azure App Service and bind it to an Azure Database for MySQL.
